channel.title: Client help (again im new at this)
channel.description: Okay well i did everything!@ Portfowarded it and did everything, Now pplz can come to mai server and enjoy! But i need a download link for people to get the client? How will i get the link that people can download and play? Please share and thanks(: [Please dont leave a trolling comment]

item.title: Client help (again im new at this)
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.
